title: Footballs Greatest
overview: Football's Greatest is special series of shows dedicated to the best players to have graced this beautiful game. The show started on the June 10, 2010 and finished on July 11, 2010 on Sky Sports for the World Cup. There were 26 shows in total, 25 featuring one footballer for each show. The first show was about players that didn't make the following shows but were still notable.
